title: [Large-scale] Development and Implementation of a Digital Education Design Model for Medical Graduate Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Digital medical education curriculum operating in a smartphone-centric, constrained technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply the nine-stage process of a digital instructional design model.
Learners can apply evidence-based instructional design principles to Postgraduate Medical Digital Education (PGMDE).
Learners can develop effective digital educational materials in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
